task.summary: listen to id if editing or index if creating recipes
keep tags in show recipe from looking like buttons
fix inability to delete single menu item when duplicates
revert back to using index instead of ID for editing ingredients; too many cases where we don't have an id can don't know if we should or shouldn't have an id inside HOCs to reliably use id field
first working draft (all pages working, lots of bugs)
remove localstorage until I better understand that
switch to mongo-connect for session storage
filter by ingredients or recipe name
add support for multiple tag filtering
add user profile images, remove public facing api keys (whoops!) and add new keys :)
add profile images to recipe cards
change parseInt to Number() as parseInt doesn't handle decimals without leading 0s
add collections to model, add route for adding recipe to collection
starting to add dialog box for adding recipes to collections -> weird stuff going on with event listener though
